did.unittitle: Richard L. Rowan and Robert E. Barr Research Materials for "Employee Relations Trends and Practices in the Textile Industry",
did.origination:
Rowan, Richard L.;
Barr, Robert E.
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection is the research material used to write the book "Employee relations trends and practices in the textile industry," A copy of which is located in the ILR Library stacks, call no. HD8039.T42 G47

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
